# Youtube Video Transcript Extraction

## Overview

- **Total Nodes**: 7
- **Node Types**: 6
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)

## Node Breakdown

## Troubleshooting
